author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Carefully remove the yolk from the eggs and put in a bowl. Mash in the salad cream and a little of the toppings.  Spoon the yolk mixture back into the halved eggs and place on a serving plate.
ingredients: 2 free-range eggs, hard-boiled, peeled, halved lengthways,  2 tsp salad cream,  cherry tomatoes, chopped,  cooked bacon bits,  cress,  spring onion, sliced
